T02vchedpgu:241: 2. budbudaḥ supinaṃ vidyud abhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtaṃ // idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sthavirasubhūtis te ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś
T02vchedpgu:242: 3. ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan // // vajracchedikā prajñāpāramitā samāptāḥ // //
